Author: ukrainumedved
Content:
The year is 1924 4/4 (Essentially earth's 1782), after industrialisation hits the Holy Order of Vetokia a few seasons ago, the economy of Vetokia grows significantly. However, with the classic move of corruption, industrial projects were often corrupted, and just in seasons, the economy falls into stagnation. Industrial advancements were crippled, thus a potential on a backward economy is imminent. This anger economists, however their words are often compared towards voids, just another mindless noises from the intellectuals. Economists were silenced, and the economy was sacrificed just for personal satisfication.... An end to Vetokia is inevitable

A prominent theatre director, an economist, a man who dared to challenge the Holy Order, Priyol Zerovanoy....

Author: ukrainumedved
Content: Priyol Zerovanoy was born in 1919 1/4 (1755 on Earth) to a middle class family. His mother was a math teacher, but his father was an economist who was prominent in the capital of the Holy Order, Zamdozhe. He grew up interested on theatres. He mastered the skill of theatre performance, thus he made into directing. At such a young age, his amazing creations led him to be the student that represents theatre performances from his school in Zamdozhe. Although his prominent piece of creation was on theatres, his parents insisted him on economics. He was also interested on economics on his school years, often getting the best grades in his school on economics, art, and social science.

Author: ukrainumedved
Content: He went into the Zamdozhe National University, now known as the Zamdozhe Socialist Academy. Being a prominent student in economics, he oversaw the first industrialisation on the Schonwein Empire. The Holy Order of Vetokia industrialises at a fast speed, however that was proven to be useless when corruption lashes out. After his critiques were proven on his books, and with big support, he publishes a book called the "A mind of existence".

Author: ukrainumedved
Content: (Stopping the writing for now, but this hasnt been finished)
